docket_entries.description: Minute Entry for proceedings held before District Judge Stephen N. Limbaugh, Jr:Arraignment and Plea: Parties present for arraignment and plea. Defendant waives reading of superseding misdemeanor information, plea of guilty as to Adama Kane (1) Count 1s held on 2/15/2018 Objections to Presentence Report due by 5/16/2018. Sentencing set for 6/6/2018 02:30 PM in Courtroom 3N before District Judge Stephen N. Limbaugh Jr..
